page0.name:
Game Enhancements 
and Hard-Coded Options
page0.hint: This page lets you choose Hard-Coded Options and Game Enhancements.
page0.popup: This page lets you choose Hard-Coded Options and Game Enhancements.

page1.name:
Map Enhancements 
and Artifacts
page1.hint: This page lets you select a variety of Map Enhancements and Artifacts to customize your game.
page1.popup: This page lets you select a variety of Map Enhancements and Artifacts to customize your game.

group0.name: Map Enhancements and Artifacts
group0.hint: These options let you customize certain aspects of a map and select new and scripted artifacts you wish to appear in the game.
group0.popup:
MAP ENHANCEMENTS AND ARTIFACTS 

These options let you customize certain aspects of a map and select new and scripted artifacts you wish to appear in the game.

page3.name: New and Enhanced Objects
page3.hint: This page lets you choose new and enhanced Objects for inclusion in the game.
page3.popup: This page lets you choose new and enhanced Objects for inclusion in the game.

group0.name: Object Replacements
group0.hint: Select the treasure chests and new and scripted artifacts you wish to appear in the game.
group0.popup:
OBJECT REPLACEMENTS 

Select the treasure chests and new and scripted artifacts you wish to appear in the game.

45.noCityHall:
{Gold Reserve} 

 Sorry, but {City Hall} must be built before the Gold Reserve can be built.
45.alreadyBuild: Sorry, but today in this town, one of the buildings has already been improved. Try to do it tomorrow.
45.mainGoldReserveMsg:
{Gold Reserve} 

 At the moment, the gold reserve brings the kingdom {@gold@ gold} per day.
45.upgrGoldReserveMsg:
You can improve the income of the gold reserve by {1000 gold.} 
 You need the following resources:
45.noResToUpgradeGoldReserve: Sorry, but you don't have enough resources to improve your Gold Reserve.
45.noResToUpgradeUpgDwelling: Sorry, but you don't have enough resources to improve this Creatures Dwelling.
45.noOneUpgDwelling:
{The Recruitment of Troops} 

 Sorry, but for additional recruitment of troops in this town, at least one improved Creatures Dwelling must be built.
45.mainCreaturesMsg:
{The Recruitment of Troops} 

 You can increase the increase of the creatures of your town. 
 The increase in the increase can only be made in improved buildings. 

 Select the type of creatures to increase their gain:

46.description:
Strikes and returns. No enemy retaliation.
Berserk attack.

109.title:
{Market of Time}

 We help you regain some of your lost years by teaching meditation techniques that let you forget useless skills. This frees up your mind for new learning. We charge a nominal fee of @gold@ gold coins for our service.
109.forget:
{Market of Time}

 Do you really want to forget this skill for @gold@ gold?
109.noMoney:
{Market of Time}

 You don't have enough money. Come back when you can afford our services.
109.noSkills:
{Market of Time}

 We're sorry @name@, but you need to know at least one skill first.
109.noMoves:
{Market of Time}

 Your hero is too tired. Come back tomorrow.
